holidays.name: Kitten Appreciation Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to pampering and celebrating our adorable feline friends, especially those tiny, fluffy kittens that melt hearts everywhere!
holidays.origin: An internet-born observance gaining popularity among cat lovers who share kitten photos and foster kittens to find new homes.
holidays.funFact: Adopting a kitten on Kitten Appreciation Day can boost your happiness levels — vets say kitten purrs can be therapeutic!

holidays.name: Tropical Cocktail Day
holidays.description: Cheers to the colorful, fruity drinks that scream vacation! This day invites you to mix up or sip on your favorite tropical cocktails like piña coladas or mojitos.
holidays.origin: Celebrated by bartenders and cocktail enthusiasts to honor the joy of tropical flavors and summer vibes.
holidays.funFact: The Piña Colada was named the official drink of Puerto Rico in 1978, perfect for Tropical Cocktail Day celebrations!

holidays.name: Paper Bag Day
holidays.description: A day to recognize and appreciate the humble paper bag — a simple, eco-friendlier alternative to plastic bags.
holidays.origin: Began as an environmental awareness initiative to encourage reusing and valuing everyday items.
holidays.funFact: The first machine to automatically make paper bags was invented in 1852 and revolutionized shopping forever!

holidays.name: Swear Like a Sailor Day
holidays.description: An excuse to let loose your colorful language just like the rough-and-tumble sailors of old—without judgment!
holidays.origin: Rooted in maritime tradition where sailors had the reputation of salty language, this day humorously embraces that lore.
holidays.funFact: Despite the stereotype, sailors swore partly to relieve stress in tough conditions, making it oddly therapeutic!
